data.title: Drew Sidora Bio, Wiki, RHOA, Age, Height, Family, and Career
data.meta_description: Drew Sidora is an entrepreneur, television and film actress, producer, singer, and philanthropist. Sidora made a name in the heart of Chicago
data.text:
Drew Sidora Age

How old is Sidora? She is 37 years old as of 2024. Sidora was born on May 1, 1985, in Chicago, Illinois, USA. She celebrates her birthday on the 1st of May every year.

Drew Sidora Education

She has not disclosed information regarding where she attended College/University. This information is currently under review.

Drew Sidora Height|Weight

Sidora stands on an average height of 5 feet 7 inches and weighs around 55kgs.

Drew Sidora Family

She is the daughter of Rev. Jeanette and B. Jordan, however, she has not revealed information regarding her family members. This information will be updated as soon as it is available.

Drew Sidora Husband|Married

Sidora is happily married to her beloved husband Ralph Pittman since 21 August 2014. She has not disclosed information about her husband. This information will be updated as soon as it is available.

Drew Sidora Children

She is blessed with three children; a son named Josiah born on March 21, 2011, with her ex-boyfriend, a second-born son called Machai David Pittman born on June 30, 2015, and a daughter called Aniya Grace Pittman called February 14, 2018, with her husband Ralph Pittman. Machai was born 7 weeks prematurely and underwent 3 weeks of hospitalization. He was 4 lbs. 4.5 ounces and 16.5 inches at birth.

Drew Sidora Career

Sidora has made a name for herself from the heart of Chicago, Illinois, through her music and many roles which include her recurring part in Disney’s “That’s So Raven” as Chantel, her feature in “The Game,” as Lucy Avila in the movie “Step Up,” and over 20 additional feature films. She is passionate about giving back and supporting youth. Sidora founded her charity organization DREAM MAKERS, a vocal crusader for young girls and women, in 2013. In addition, she is dedicated to advocating for young women in need while also using her platform to entertain, transform, energize, and inspire. Back for her sophomore season, she returns with a major glow-up and new acting gigs and business ventures in the works.

The Real Housewives Of Atlanta

The Real Housewives of Atlanta is an American reality television series that premiered on Bravo on October 7, 2008. It was developed as the third installment of The Real Housewives franchise and it has aired for thirteen seasons. The show focuses on the personal and professional lives of several women residing in and around Atlanta, Georgia.

RHOA has received moderately favorable reviews from critics and has been recognized as a “guilty pleasure” by several media outlets. The main show cast consists of Shereé Whitfield, Kandi Burruss, Kenya Moore, Drew Sidora, Marlo Hampton, and Sanya Richards-Ross, with Monyetta Shaw-Carter serving as a “friend of the housewives”.However, the series has been criticized for appearing to fabricate portions of its storyline. RHOA has anchored Bravo’s Sunday night offerings since the show had its third season in 2010, eventually becoming Bravo’s highest-rated program by 2014.

The Real Housewives of Atlanta show premiered on October 7, 2008. It starred Nene Leakes, Kim Zolciak, Shereé Whitfield, Lisa Wu Hartwell, and Deshawn Snow. Kandi Burruss joined the cast, replacing Deshawn Snow, for Season 2 which premiered July 30, 2009. Season 3 premiered on October 4, 2010, with new cast members Phaedra Parks and Cynthia Bailey replacing Lisa Wu Hartwell.

Season 4 started taping in April 2011 and premiered on November 6, 2011, with the entire Season 3 cast returning and Marlo Hampton joining as a “friend of the housewives”. With the fifth season renewal, Shereé Whitfield was not invited back and was replaced by Kenya Moore. Porsha Stewart also joined the cast and Kim Zolciak departed mid-season. The show was renewed for a sixth season on April 2, 2013, and has begun taping with the entire Season 5 cast expected to return.

Drew Sidora Salary|Net Worth

She has an estimated salary ranging between $70,000 – $125,000 and has an estimated net worth of $1 Million -$5 Million which she earns from her career.

Sidora is an entrepreneur, television and film actress, producer, singer, and philanthropist. Sidora has made a name for herself in the heart of Chicago, Illinois, through her music and many roles.

Is Drew Sidora Married?

Sidora is happily married to her beloved husband Ralph Pittman since 21 August 2014. She has not disclosed information about her husband. This information will be updated as soon as it is available.
